{{wikipedia|Ochikubo Monogatari}}
==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|落|窪}}

===Etymology===
A compound of [[落ち|ochi]] "fallen" and [[窪|kubo]] "depression".

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おちくぼ|オチクボ}}

# A place within a house lower than the regular floor. A depressed, recessed location.

===Usage notes===
The book [[w:Ochikubo Monogatari|Ochikubo Monogatari]] takes its name from such a room where the protagonist resides.
